name: tm94
effect: Teaches rock smash to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Rock Smash to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.black-white: The user attacks with a punch that can shatter a rock. It may also lower the target’s Defense stat.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user attacks with a punch that can shatter a rock. It may also lower the target’s Defense stat.
